column4: Anyone running Intrepid Ibex (amd64) and an Emerald Theme having trouble getting it to automatically start when logging in.. I have it added to sessions ("emerald --replace&") which has worked in the past.. any thoughts????
get fusion-icon ?
geez dont be so anal
hold that thought, I have to restart quick
what about this icon you speak of....???
fusion-icon
install it and add it to sessions
what does it do?
its an applet for compiz/beril/metacity and whatnot
the issue im having is with Emerald not loading though.. with this take care of it?
is emerald still available in ubuntu?
yup
using it right now.. just doesnt auto start from the session
then fusionicon should see that too i guess
Can anyone tell me the command to launch "Volume Control" its in System > Preferences, and I deleted it by accident
thanks for your help, ill give it a shot
gnome-volume-control
thanks again =)
you wouldnt happen to know how to disable the gnome-panel and prevent it from running would ya lol???
right click the panel and select remove
the primary one, you cant.. and in Ibex they took out the session control tab
so fusion-icon works on starting emerald

but, Compiz Fusion trys to start when I log in, then Fusion Icon starts and i guess restarts compiz.. and then awn gets hung up cause im not running a composite window manager.. so how do I stop compiz from starting and let fusion-icon control everything???
